Jane (Mengyi) Shi
Education Leader & Project Manager

I’m an Ed.D. candidate at Northeastern University and a Program Coordinator at Santa Monica College, where I lead tutoring programs for over 35 student workers each semester.

My work spans across educational leadership, EdTech implementation, and volunteer project management. I’ve developed virtual platforms for tutoring, founded TransferBot – an AI-powered chatbot for California transfer students – and created apps and sites to help people make smarter financial and educational decisions.

I hold a PMP certification, and I’m passionate about optimizing workflows, mentoring student success, and expanding access to learning, both in person and online.
